title: 101 Tips for Traveling with a Vampire
description: There aren't many resources for humans running with the "undead" - until now. Featuring 101 tips for everything from boat travel to the classic Road trip. Sometimes funny and sometimes serious, these tips will prepare you for a vampire vacation. The revamped version includes a sneak peek of "Ashes of Deceit", book 4 in the Amaranthine series and a sample of Shades of Plaid by co-author Jonathan James Harvey
author: Joleene Naylor
